name: Hexa Games: Hexagon Number Puzzles Collection
name_original: Hexa Games: Hexagon Number Puzzles Collection
description:
★ 28 simple & challenging match-3 games and puzzles of hexagons and numbers.

★ All games can be played offline without internet.

★ All games are suitable for the whole family adults and kids.

★ All games have save button to save playing progress to resume it later.

★ Universal: supports both phone & tablet devices with consistent and comfortable UI.

Hexagon puzzles: collection of match 3 hexa numbers games and puzzles for the whole family adults and kids.

It includes many different hexa number games to practice and improve logic, brain training and deductive reasoning skills.

Google Play Store: Hexa Games: Hexagon Number Puzzles Collection

The hexagon games can be grouped into 4 categories:-

Hexa merge numbers games: to merge 3 or more same adjacent numbers into the next higher numbers:-

★ hexagons: shoot and merge numbers

★ hexa attack: shoot and merge numbers

★ hexagon columns: drop and merge numbers

★ hexagons: swap and merge numbers

★ hexagons: drag and merge numbers

★ hexagons: slide and merge numbers

★ hexagons: tap and merge numbers

★ hexagons: connect and merge numbers

Hexa 2048 merge numbers games: to merge 3 or more same adjacent numbers so that their sum will be converted to the nearest number in the series [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, ..., 1024, 2048, ...]:-

★ hexagons 2048: shoot and merge numbers

★ hexa attack 2048: shoot and merge numbers

★ hexagon columns 2048: drop and merge numbers

★ hexagons 2048: swap and merge numbers

★ hexagons 2048: slide and merge numbers

★ hexagons 2048: tap and merge numbers

★ hexagons 2048: connect and merge numbers

Hexa clear numbers games: to remove 3 or more same adjacent numbers from the board:-

★ hexagons: shoot and clear numbers

★ hexagon columns: drop and clear numbers

★ hexagons: swap and clear numbers

★ hexagons: drag and clear numbers

★ hexagons: slide and clear numbers

★ hexagons: tap and clear numbers

★ hexagons: connect and clear numbers

Hexa 2048 clear numbers games: to remove 3 or more same adjacent numbers from the board. The numbers are the repeated multiplication of number 2 [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, ..., 1024, 2048, ...]:-

★ hexagons 2048: shoot and clear numbers

★ hexagon columns 2048: drop and clear numbers

★ hexagons 2048: swap and clear numbers

★ hexagons 2048: slide and clear numbers

★ hexagons 2048: tap and clear numbers

★ hexagons 2048: connect and clear numbers

So there are 2 types of games:

- Merge hexa numbers: to merge 3 or more same adjacent numbers into the next higher number.

- Clear hexa numbers: to remove 3 or more same adjacent numbers from the board.

All games have its own 2048 version where the numbers are the repeated multiplication of number 2 [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, ..., 1024, 2048, ...].

The games are number games, match 3 games, logic puzzle games, brain games, block puzzle games and brainteasers.

There are 2 in-app purchases:

- Remove ads: to remove advertisements from the game.

- 100,000 stars: to remove numbers from the board when there are no more tries.

The game supports 16 languages: English – Arabic – French – Spanish – German – Japanese – Chinese – Urdu – Hindi – Italian – Portuguese – Turkish – Russian – Korean – Bengali – Malay. The translations are done using Google Translate for all languages except English and Arabic. If you’d like to participate in translating the game content into your native language, please send an email to: playstore.ganaysa@gmail.com

If you are left-handed: you can change the position of the buttons to the left of the screen from the settings page.

Feel free to tell us your feedback, suggestions, requests and rate our hexa numbers game.

Play, enjoy and have fun !
